e.g..translation[0].definitions[0].examp: citrus fruits, e.g. oranges and grapefruit
e.g..translation[0].definitions[0].note_: In formal contexts such as essays or business letters, people usually avoid using the abbreviation e.g., and write for example in full:
They might use local health care facilities, for example clinics and district hospitals.
e.g..translation[1].definitions[0].defin: abbreviation for for example, used when you are listing some examples of things you are talking about
